title: ONIDA 215 L Direct Cool Single Door 2 Star Refrigerator  (Wine Lily, RDS2152P)

product_specification.Other Features: Anti-Bacterial Removal Gasket, Jumbo Vege Box, Large Storage Space, Floral Design Door, Environment Friendly, Power Cut Evocool Technology
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Comprehensive Warranty on Product, 10 Years Warranty on Compressor
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Designer Floral Door: This home appliance features an aesthetically pleasing designer floral door to add some style to your kitchen area.
product_description.Antibacterial Removal Gasket: This gasket keeps the door liner clean to keep your edibles hygienic and fresh. Also, it prevents bacteria and fungi from forming inside this refrigerator.

review:
Awesome product. A very good refrigerator with lot of features like lnstant chilling, quick ice formation, Temperature control knob with atmospheric conditions and very good metalic body with floral designs.
Finally it's worth for the money spent.
Fridge parts are cheap, overall look wise good but finishing is not upto mark. Compressor making lot of noise. Overall not worth of money spend

Very nice Design and Graphics at this price.... Very low Sound of the compressor..... Fast and efficient cooling which is very good.... Make & Built quality is very good.... Overall value for money product... Must buy for the price given after offers at Flipkart.....

Everything was 5in but for installation n warranty clime is not available with the fridge so before buying this item from flipkart please do check all this n assure ur self that everything is 5in then u buy apart from all this everything is fine
Appreciate the delivery boys who did fantastic job.. Though my area was under seal down..they did a great delivery.. Appreciate their hardwork,patience and commitment during these tough times..
